title: Police Rescue Australia
overview: Police Rescue Australia pulls back the curtain on the often traumatic and high-risk incidents faced by these elite officers, who put their lives on the line daily to keep Australians safe. The series follows the unit's operations within the Sydney and Blue Mountains regions of New South Wales.Viewers can expect a broad range of dramatic scenarios, from mountain and cliff helicopter rescues and searching for missing persons in the breathtaking Blue Mountains, to managing sieges, defusing bombs, and abseiling down the iconic Sydney Harbour Bridge. Police Rescue Australia promises to provide an emotional, action-packed journey as these officers navigate the daily trials and dangers inherent in their critical roles.
